array.string: Have you successfully bled a radiator?
Have you made something useful with your bare hands?
Do you have a favourite type of cable?
Is your toolbox large, sturdy and well stocked?
Do you understand the offside rule?
Have you run a marathon?
Have you fired a gun?
Have you beaten a grown man at an arm wrestle?
Have you been punched in the face?
Have you punched someone in the face?
Have you been arrested?
Have you driven a car over 100 mph?
Is your after toilet smell as bas as/worse than your dad's / elder male relative?
Have you worn the same pair of underpants for more than two consecutive days?
Have you not shaved for more than three months?
Can you credibly explain how a "twin overhead cam shaft" works?
Do you have a plan of action come the fall of society and / or the zombie apocalypse.
Have you woken up in a different town after a night out?
Have you eaten horse?
Can you drink ten pints of premium continental lager or authentic English ale?
Have you killed and gutted an animal?
Can you start a fire without matches or a lighter?
Have you destroyed anything with an axe?
Have you had a shit in a field, woods or outdoor area (not in your pants)?
Have you urinated in a vessel of finite capacity only to find it quickly overflowing?
